message.content:
{
  "insights": [
    "No decisions were captured today; outcomes stayed at zero.",
    "Environment data appears placeholder; real signals not yet integrated.",
    "Lack of explicit goals and constraints limited actionable moves.",
    "Reflection framework is set; needs real inputs and decision tracking."
  ],
  "memory_additions": [
    "Ask for today's objectives and constraints before acting.",
    "Set and log success metrics and baseline at start of day.",
    "Create and use a decision log with rationale and expected impact.",
    "Verify environment data feeds are connected and fresh.",
    "Run one low-risk experiment to test assumptions daily.",
    "Escalate when the decision object is empty or underspecified."
  ],
  "risk_flags": [
    "No decisions recorded; risk of inactivity.",
    "Missing or placeholder data may mislead evaluation.",
    "Profit delta at 0.0 could hide integration issues.",
    "Unclear priorities increase chance of unfocused efforts."
  ],
  "next_day_hypotheses": [
    "Clarifying goals/constraints will improve decision quality.",
    "Integrating real data will introduce measurable outcome variance.",
    "A small controlled test will validate the feedback loop.",
    "Decision tracking will reveal patterns for optimization."
  ]
}

insights: No decisions were captured today; outcomes stayed at zero.

Reflection framework is set; needs real inputs and decision tracking.
